item.title: Report X-2024120919
item.description:
Report X-2024120919

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-10
  • City: TUKWILA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024120919 NO COMMENTS PROVIDED. 2. X-2024120920 NO COMMENTS PROVIDED. 3. X-2024120921 LEAKING PLASTIC DRUM WAS DISCOVERED BY AN AUDITOR WHO THEN NOTIFIED A RESPONDER. ALL PPE (GLOVES, GOGGLES, BOOTS, APRON, SILVER LINING) WAS PUT ON AND DRUM WAS PLACED INTO A YELLOW TUB/DMP BAG. DRUM WAS THEN TRANSFERRED TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. ALL TUBS/PPE WERE THEN DECONTAMINATED AND DRUM WAS FURTHER PROCESSED INTO ETT. 4. X-2024120922 LEAKING PLASTIC DRUM WAS DISCOVERED BY AN AUDITOR WHO THEN NOTIFIED A RESPONDER. ALL PPE (GLOVES, GOGGLES, BOOTS, APRON, SILVER LINING) WAS PUT ON AND DRUM WAS PLACED INTO A YELLOW TUB/DMP BAG. DRUM WAS THEN TRANSFERRED TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. ALL TUBS/PPE WERE THEN DECONTAMINATED AND DRUM WAS FURTHER PROCESSED INTO ETT.

item.title: Report X-2024121055
item.description:
Report X-2024121055

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-19
  • City: SPOKANE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE FIVE GALLON SINGLE PACKAGING SHIPMENT WAS STOPPED FOR INSPECTION TO DETERMINE IF THE PRODUCT IS REGULATED IN AIR TRANSPORTATION. UNABLE TO OBTAIN A SAFETY DATA SHEET FROM THE SHIPPER. BLING CHEMICAL WEBSITE SUGGESTS THE PRODUCT IS REGULATED IN AIR TRANSPORTATION AS UN3262 CORROSIVE SOLID BASIC INORGANIC NOS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER CONTAINER. RED ORIENTATION ARROWS HAVE BEEN APPLIED. THE PACKAGE WAS STOPPED FOR INSPECTION PRIOR TO ANY MOVEMENT ON UPS AIRCRAFT.
